text: @AmyMcGrathKY Lord almighty, McConnel barely does his job anyway, refusing to bring most laws to a vote. Learn 2 Multitask, McConnel. Hell, learn to at least get single tasks done. You had all February to get geared up for coronavirus, and sat on your aft.
